mapper.select: SELECT company.ID,company.COMPANYNAME, company.LOGO FROM hm_pub_staff as staff LEFT JOIN hm_pub_company as company ON staff.COMPANYID = company.ID WHERE staff.PHONE = #{phone} AND staff.PASSWORD = #{password}

SELECT company.ID,company.COMPANYNAME, company.LOGO FROM hm_pub_staff as staff LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff_detail as detail ON staff.ID = detail.ID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_company as company ON staff.COMPANYID = company.ID WHERE detail.WECHATUNIODID = #{unionId}

SELECT staff.ID,staff.COMPANYID,staff.TOKEN,staff.STATUSFLAG, staff.ISLOCK,staff.ISDEL,staff.HEARTTIME,staff.WHITEFLAG FROM hm_pub_staff as staff LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff_detail as detail ON staff.ID = detail.ID WHERE detail.WECHATUNIODID = #{unionId} AND staff.COMPANYID = #{companyId}

SELECT company.ID,company.COMPANYNAME, company.LOGO FROM hm_pub_staff as staff LEFT JOIN hm_pub_staff_detail as detail ON staff.ID = detail.ID LEFT JOIN hm_pub_company as company ON staff.COMPANYID = company.ID WHERE detail.DINGUNIONID = #{unionId}
